column2: an A.M. Eatery////Had the Benny Duo
column3: which was excellent. Only reason not 5 stars is the wait time
column4: with the bus time and seating a new party was longer than should need to be. More than 15 minutes at several tables. We were told 1-1/2 to 1-3/4 hour wait
column6: which gave us plenty of time to observe turnover.
